summary: Aziraphale, a playlist by Anežka Koudelová on Spotify
body:
So hello people, i have made a playlist for my boy Aziraphale cause i haven’t seen any just for him yet, which is a bleeding shame. It’s centered on Aziraphale’s feeling for Crowley. I think I’ll make one for Crowley too eventually… if i get motivated enough.

Aziraphale, a playlist by Anežka Koudelová on Spotify

blog.name: mostlyanything19
blog.title: I'm just saying...
blog.description:
your local nonbinary lesbian | 26 | autistic | germany | she/her or they/them please | Lyan if you really need a name
Stuff you'll find here:
– Whatever the hell catches my fancy
– Fandom love! This includes CURRENTLY ABOUT 300% GOOD OMENS, Pacific Rim, Sherlock Holmes in any shape and form, Lotr/the Hobbit, my newly re-awakened love for Doctor Who, Star Trek TOS,
and more peripherally: Supernatural, the MCU, J2 (as pretty much the only actors I am actively About), Check, Please!, Ghostbusters and Black Sails, the X-Files, Ace Attorney, Merlin, and a whole bunch of others that come and go. Basically I have a lot of fandoms but I'm normally hyperfixating on one or two of the big ones at any given time. I tag everything.
Icon by: ashagrxyjoy

tags: eliminating 'my dears' is NOT the way to go here!!
even less after he's already in my bad books for the spain nonsense from the last part
summary: German Good Omens 3: People wearing sunglasses even when they dunt need to
title: German Good Omens 3: People wearing sunglasses even when they dunt need to
body:
As well as: People misunderstanding the text they’re supposed to translate.

(part 1, part 2)

  • Good news for Crowley: If it comes to critizising his sunglasses-wearing habits, Hastur has very little ground to stand on in the GGO universe. In fact, it seems to be common practice: Meet young Newton Pulsifer, originally “twelve, thin, and bespectacled”, in this version of events “twelve and thin and wearing a pair of thick sunglasses”. In his room. Late at night. Implied to be the pair he always wears, since they’re thick, so clearly made to actually accomodate his bad eyesight.
    #fashion #SunglassesAtNight
    (A concept: Every tape left longer than a fortnight in Dick Turpin transforms into a Best Of Corey Hart tape.)

  • German Good Omens makes Aziraphale an archangel (”Erzengel” in German – is that the reason for calling him Erziraphael? Is this a pun??)

  • Just a few pages after Newt’s sunglasses, Mr. Translator misses the mark on yet another text passage, and this one is a little more significant. Please correct me if I got this totally wrong, but I always understood the part about the Arrangement and “If one was going to Hull for a quick temptation, it made sense to nip across the city and carry out a standard brief moment of divine ecstacy” as: Crowley and Aziraphale on occasion just do each other’s jobs as well as their own – to, as the text says, “give everyone more free time and cut down on expenses.” It’s a pretty significant bit in showing how much they’re blurring the lines between them, and away from the clearly delineated “Sides” they’re supposed to belong to.
    Sadly, this is totally lost in the German version. Instead, it says: “If one [clearly meaning Crowley] couldn’t resist anymore and and went out for a quick temptation, the other [clearly meaning Aziraphale] carried out a standard brief moment of divine ecstacy to preserve the balance between Good and Evil.” Which does honestly a great job in MISSING THE POINT COMPLETELY. This isn’t about them amicably cancelling each other out while still only sticking to their respective angelic or demonic activities, it’s about them BOTH doing BOTH because they’re LAZY and the Good/Evil divide is BULLSHIT.

  • It should come as no surprise to anyone that my opinion on this book as a whole will hinge very strongly on how well Mr. Translator preserves my favorite moments – and that DEFINITELY includes A&C’s endearments, right at the top of the list! So when Crowley sinks the duck and Aziraphale’s “Really, my dear?” gets turned into something as entirely neutralized as: “Ist das unbedingt nötig?” (“Is that really necessary?”), well, colour me not impressed. Would it have KILLED him to add “mein Lieber” at the end of that? I Think Not. You’re on thin fucking ice, Mr. T.

summary: can you imagine going through a war against your fellow angels and being cast out of heaven, getting tossed up to earth with...
body:
can you imagine going through a war against your fellow angels and being cast out of heaven, getting tossed up to earth with vague instructions, watching what you thought was a small bit of trouble balloon into something shocking and unjust, and this angel you’re talking to who’s been arguing that the injustice MUST be okay

and then you find out that whatever he SAYS, the way he acts indicates he’s right there with you. he’s from the other side, but deep down he’s no worse or better than you and he’s just as confused and upset by the humans’ plight

after all that fighting and confusions and loneliness, how do you not fall in love immediately?

blog.name: katy-133
blog.title: Writer, Wanderer, Wonderer
blog.description:
I'm a Canadian animator for children's television series. In my spare time, I'm an artist, writer, and indie game developer.
I post my art and WIP artwork of games and visual novels I'm working on. I also do commissions on deviantART, and write the occasional academic article.

title: Beat Saber
body:

by Katy133

blog.name: nintendogal55
blog.title: NintendoGal's Broken Mind
blog.description: Ask me anything! Submit Ko-Fi My Old Crap On FF.net My MLP Stuff on FIMFiction Silly Artworks I do post a lot of fandom things, sometimes too many things to count. But some of my "main" posts are as follows that you can enter in a tag search. More will be added over time! My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Ed Edd n Eddy The Nightmare Before Christmas Gravity Falls Good Omens I don't post a lot of my fanfic stuff here aside from previews. But if you follow my Ed Edd n Eddy material, I do post a lot of ficlets here, of which are Tumblr exclusive. You can usually find them in the above tag for the show (if you don't mind sifting through a lot of posts!), but I will provide a couple of links below. Eds Ficlets Jurassic Ed Jurassic Ed 2 Jumanji: Until The Dice Read Five or Ed Homeward Ed Titanic: Never Let Me Ed Devil Eddy AU If you want my Ed Edd n Eddy fanfictions I post on AO3, I put a master post link right down below so that you can pick which ones you want to read individually! Ed Edd n Eddy AO3 Fanfics Master Post I've made my share of silly videos as a hobby. Because I have quite a couple so far posted here on Tumblr, I made a master post for them! I will add to the list if I create more in the future. Silly Videos I also have an in-character blog for Ed right out of Ed Edd n Eddy! Feel free to check it out! Ed Blog

summary: I love how Crowley calls himself Anthony Crowley on his voicemail. XD Shouldn’t be surprised, obviously he had to go along with...
body:
I love how Crowley calls himself Anthony Crowley on his voicemail. XD Shouldn’t be surprised, obviously he had to go along with having a fake human name! It suits him, I think.

Funny mention also to poor Aziraphale getting frustrated as he’s trying to get through to his demon boyfriend him over the phone. Oh dear… xD

reblog.comment:

summary: I really considered live-blogging this book but I’m gonna have to do it from a more generally plot based point of view cause ten...
body:
I really considered live-blogging this book but I’m gonna have to do it from a more generally plot based point of view cause ten pages in and I’m already shitting myself like

Crawly?

The whole paragraph about lurking?

Communication through a Queen album?

Idk what’s happening but I LOVE it

summary: Join the my angel my demon and me Discord Server!
body:
Join the my angel my demon and me Discord Server!

Do you like Good Omens? Do you have a McElroy sense of humor? Then you’ll LOVE My Angel My Demon and Me

My Angel My Demon and Me is a server run by folks who love Good Omens and also the McElroy brothers. It’s no requirement to like the brothers too, though! We’ll accept anyone with a kind sense of humor and a love of the book! We’re ultra LGBT+ friendly (hell, the mods are all LGBT+ too!) and lenient with our use of swear words too.

We have age limits on this server for the sake of making sure no one feels uncomfortable. Our minimum age is 15, and our maximum is 25! We understand that there are a lot of fans older than 25, but this is the age range that the moderators are most comfortable with.

Because our minimum age is 15, we allow jokes and japes about nsfw things—you know, the typical “high schooler joking haha penis”—but NO serious nsfw discussion! Two of the mods are minors, and we are not going to moderate a serious nsfw discussion channel.

But we love fun! We’re super supportive of all people (except, you know, pedophiles, abuse apologists, racist people, those sort of people) and we love making new friends! So come on in! Stop on by! We’re always welcome to meet new people!

blog.name: katy-133
blog.title: Writer, Wanderer, Wonderer
blog.description:
I'm a Canadian animator for children's television series. In my spare time, I'm an artist, writer, and indie game developer.
I post my art and WIP artwork of games and visual novels I'm working on. I also do commissions on deviantART, and write the occasional academic article.
